docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Oct. 28 -- Approving the United Nations Charter framed at Dumbarton Oaks in its general lines, Ambassador Juan Carlos Blanco of Uruguay, suggested in a statement today a preliminary discussion of the proposals by the nations of the...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 28 -- Approving the United Nations Charter framed at Dumbarton Oaks in its general lines, Ambassador Juan Carlos Blanco of Uruguay, suggested in a statement today a preliminary discussion of the proposals by the nations of the Americas before the full dress conference meets.
docs.abstract: Uruguayan Amb Blanco advises preliminary discussion of Dumbarton proposals before United Nations peace conf

headline.main: Uruguayan Envoy Advises Peace Parley Of Americas Before Full-Dress Meeting

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Oct. 29 -- The Argentine Government's proposal that its relations with other American Governments should be discussed by a conference of Foreign Ministers has so far been received throughout the hemisphere with official silence and has...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Oct. 29 -- The Argentine Government's proposal that its relations with other American Governments should be discussed by a conference of Foreign Ministers has so far been received throughout the hemisphere with official silence and has been the subject of little press comment.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Nov. 9 -- (AP) -- Uruguay, in urging that the League of Nations be recognized to handle post-war world security, voiced the first official criticism of the tentative Dumbarton Oaks plan by a small nation.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 9 -- (AP) -- Uruguay, in urging that the League of Nations be recognized to handle post-war world security, voiced the first official criticism of the tentative Dumbarton Oaks plan by a small nation.
